name: Professor S and the Mysterious Labyrinth
name_original: Professor S and the Mysterious Labyrinth
description:
Professor S and his assistant Odessa have trekked across the world and ended up at the entrance to a mysterious labyrinth. Long ago, the professor was turned into a bird by an enigmatic curse, and the labyrinth may hold the key to reversing it...

While not necessarily dangerous, the maze is full of secrets and strange characters. Can you find all of them? And what exactly lies at the end of the labyrinth?

Featuring a soundtrack by Emberlynn Bland ( https://goodnightgirl.bandcamp.com/ )!
